summary: The Orphan Well Grant Flexibility Act of 2025 amends the Energy Policy Act of 2005. It addresses methane emissions measurement related to orphan well plugging grants, clarifying that states are not required to measure emissions for grant eligibility. The bill also mandates a National Academies study on the community impact of the orphan well grant program, analyzing economic development, housing, and other benefits in areas with substantial remediation activity. This study will involve input from various stakeholders and a final report to Congress.
